entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 27. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 27. Wind chill near minus 37. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 38 in the morning and minus 26 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 26 December 2022
